channel.title: Im having trouble connecting
channel.description: I have a mac and I downloaded the mac version of the client. I can log into the server that I create but whenever I try to connect to another server it says the server is down can someone tell me what is going on and how to stop it please?

item.title: Im having trouble connecting
item.dc:creator: @RuNIg_jAvAA RuNIg jAvAA
item.description:
@RuNIg_jAvAA wrote:

Try to log into your server with 0.0.0.0

And with peoples, it might not be Online.

Read full topic
